casebody.data:
Mary L. HARRIS and Artese Harris, Plaintiffs,
v.
Nicole N. ARTY, Sabrina Williams, et al., Defendants. M-354/355 September Term 2018
081923 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 6, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of GEICO Indemnity Company for leave to file a motion for direct certification as within time (M-354) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion of GEICO Indemnity Company for direct certification (M-355) is denied.
